name: Rubicon 1980
description: ‘Since 1978 Nico Myburgh and his cellarmaster Giorgio Dalla Cia have been perfecting the blend in the Médoc tradition, using mostly (60% in ‘80) Cabernet Sauvignon. Merlot and Cabernet Franc have been blended in the following proportions in the ‘80: Merlot 30% and Cabernet Franc 10%. The Merlot, especially, has proved a lovely, round, soft wine, but the backbone of the Cabernet Sauvignon is necessary. Rubicon has complexity, richness and perfumed breadth uncommon in Cape reds. First release ‘80 - Superior.’ - Platter’s SA Wine Guide 1984, 5☆ The wines will continue to be cellared at the Meerlust vintage cellar until maturity (estimated 2028) or withdrawal. Rubicon is not produced every year. If a vintage is not produced, the NFT will include the next vintage, to total 50 consecutive vintages
